description: Charcoal Burner has variable colored cap (5-15 cm) - purple, green, gray, or mixed colors - often with multiple colors on same cap. Gills white to cream. Stem white. KEY: BRITTLE CHALKY FLESH, NO LATEX, MILD TASTE. Multi-colored cap diagnostic. Flesh white. Spore print white to pale cream.
habitat: Mycorrhizal with hardwoods and conifers. Grows on ground in mixed forests. Widespread. Common species. Scattered or groups.
lookalikes: Other Russulas - check taste (mild vs acrid)
safety_notes: CHOICE EDIBLE: Excellent flavor, mild taste. Multi-colored cap + BRITTLE FLESH + MILD TASTE diagnostic. One of best edible Russulas. Taste test confirms edibility. Cook thoroughly.
